title: Understanding Gen-Z | BoF VOICES
itunes:title: Understanding Gen-Z | BoF VOICES
itunes:subtitle: The fluidity and self-starting philosophy of Generation Z is seen as troubling by many in fashion and media. But Molly Logan and her panel of accomplished Gen-Z creatives discuss what it really means for brands to work with Generation Next.To watch this.
description:
The fluidity and self-starting philosophy of Generation Z is seen as troubling by many in fashion and media. But Molly Logan and her panel of accomplished Gen-Z creatives discuss what it really means for brands to work with Generation Next.

To watch this talk at VOICES 2018 click here. 

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
